item: Imported Rice (including pusswa, butter rice, etc.)
Bread (long bread, round bread, Lebanese bread etc.)
Fritters (Callah), Pastry and Doughnut, Biscuits and Cakes, Corn bread, Rice bread, Short bread etc.
Argo Oils/ Vegetable Oils / Olive Oil
Butter, margarine and other not fat butter
Other seeds/nuts or products from nuts/seeds (cotton, soya)
Citrus fruits (oranges, lemon, tangerines, lime, etc.)
Beef (cow) including minced sausage, liver etc.
Other Domestic Fowl (Ducks, Guinea fowl, game birds etc)
Fresh Fish (cassava fish, cavalla fish, mackerel, snappers, soul fish etc.)
Wild/Bush meat (Porcupine gazelle, palm worms, chenilles, monkey meat)
Milk products (like cream, cheese, yoghurt etc)
Baby Foods (e.g. rice based, wheat based etc.)
Other alcoholic beverages (Gin, Johnny Walker, Dewar etc)
Pets (Purchase of cats, dogs, veterinary and other services)
Admission charges (local video club, cinema, stadium, concert)
Bar soap (bath/body soap/ palmolive / life buoy)
Personal services (barber, manicure, pedicure, facial, hair dressers)
Glycerine, Vaseline, skin creams, personal oils and lotions
Other personal/beauty products products (shampoo, razor blades, cosmetics, hair products, nail polish, powder, oil etc.)
Household cleaning products (dish soap, toilet cleansers, broom, brush etc.)
Internet, postage stamps or other postal fees
Donation - to church, charity, beggar, etc.
Motor vehicle service, repair, or parts
Oil change / grease job (car, motor bike, etc.)
Sports & hobby equipment, musical instruments (drums, horn, etc. Do NOT include radios/CD Player)
Film, film processing, camera, video camera
Building items - bricks, timber, zinc sheets, tools, pipes
Travel expenses (other city or country  / pilgrimage)
Losses to theft (value of items or cash lost)
Garments for men (shirts, underpants, undershirt, t-shirt, trousers, khaki shirt/trouser, pyjama, shorts, socks, suits, cloth wraps, lappa, fabric etc.)
Garments for women (dress, lappa suit, blouses, bra, underwear, skirts, boubou, jeans, skirt, lappa, cloth wrap, fabric etc.)
Sewing costs, Tailoring and Seamstress Costs, Clothing Repair Costs (for men, women and children)
Footwear for men (leather shoes, plastic sandals, sneakers, sports shoes etc.)
Footwear for women (sandals, heels, sneakers, etc.)
Accessories (handkerchiefs, belts, hats, ties, watches, handbags etc.)
Repairs to household durables and personal items (radios, watches, other appliances etc.)
Games and Toys (Chess, Cards, Checkers, Dolls, etc.)
Writing and drawing materials (notebooks, enveloes, etc.)
Financial fees (banks, money transfers Western Union / Moneygram)
Other transport related expenses (vehicle inspection, driving school, etc.)
Farm Implements (cutlass, handhoe, shovel, digger, axe, rake, pingalay, saw, chapiah, etc.)
